metadata.synopsis: This occurs as Abdirak is beating the player. Breathless with excitement. Reveling in the act of penance - think preacher in 'god will save us, save us ALL!' mode as he, well, beats the crap out of the player. All of his reactions should be manic, joyous and vaguely sexual. Player is in front of him, facing a wall as he raises his weapon and beats the player. The weapon will be either a dagger, handaxe or a scourge.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Talk to Abdirak, accept to do his penance and follow his instructions. This plays after he hit you. Make sure to have enough HP; this is not played at level 1 normally.

9.speaker: Abdirak
9.text: You are doing so well - do not give in now!
9.context: InternalNodeContext: Player gave only good answers so far!NodeContext: Player has called out again for mercy. More encouraging now in his mania (but still uber passionate and creepy)

15.speaker: Abdirak
15.context: InternalNodeContext: Previous answer was positive, but the first one was bad, so the player won't get an inspiration point anyway

25.speaker: Abdirak
25.text: Offer your pain to Loviatar - and you shall be rewarded.
25.context: InternalNodeContext: If there's a bug in the flag set or something, more than 3 hits, etc. this node will back us upNodeContext: Gearing up to strike the player. Tense with excitement and joy.

28.speaker: Abdirak
28.text: That's it! Welcome the pain. Let it become part of you!
28.context: InternalNodeContext: Player gave only good answers so far!NodeContext: Breathless, manic as he hits the player as hard as he can as the player encourages him to hit even harder. Passionate, manic, breatheless, sexual

35.speaker: Abdirak
35.context: CinematicNodeContext: Excited, weapon in hand. Pause between strikes. InternalNodeContext: Previous answer was a wrong oneNodeContext: Player has braced themselves for the third time. Yelling passionately with excitement.

27.speaker: Player
27.text: Grit your teeth and keep still.

71.speaker: Abdirak
71.text: So stoic, dear one. A pity.

65.speaker: Abdirak
65.text: You whimper so softly - so sweetly!

124.speaker: Player
124.text: Ah, mercy! I can't take it... it's too much!

48.speaker: Abdirak
48.text: Yes you can, child. Take the pain and offer it up to Loviatar. Offer it all!

83.speaker: Abdirak
83.text: Such mockery only harms you, child.

39.speaker: Player
39.text: Hit me as hard as you can - or I'll return the favour.

46.speaker: Abdirak
46.text: Hah! I hope that's a promise, dear one.

16.speaker: Abdirak
16.text: Heh. Do not tease what you will not deliver, dear one.

26.speaker: Abdirak
26.text: Yes, my child! More for Loviatar! MORE!

22.speaker: Player
22.text: Let the world recede. You neither hear the priest nor feel the blow.
22.context: InternalNodeContext: The tag is checked on the first option - if this show up, then the player is MONK

67.speaker: Player
67.text: Sing out in pain and pleasure. You've never felt so ALIVE.
67.context: InternalNodeContext: The tag is checked on the first option - if this show up, then the player is BARD

79.speaker: Abdirak
79.text: Let the sting of flesh wash away your pain!

36.speaker: Abdirak
36.text: The pain you suffer will cleanse you - do not fight it.
36.context: CinematicNodeContext: Weapon in hand (it will be either a dagger, a scourge, or a handaxe). Perhaps by his side as he takes a breathe between strikes to speak to the player. NodeContext: First time stirking the player. Excited and joyous - think a preacher building up to a full 'the lord will save us' act in a church.

38.speaker: Player
38.text: Try to hold back your cries.
38.context: InternalNodeContext: Failing this one is the "positive" outcome because the player reacts to the pain

110.speaker: Abdirak
110.text: Do not keep quiet, dear one. Let me hear you.

61.speaker: Abdirak
61.text: I heard you, dear one. Whimper, cry, beg - let it all out!

105.speaker: Player
105.text: Yelp loudly and dramatically beg for mercy.
105.context: InternalNodeContext: Succeeding this one is the "positive" outcome because of the reaction to the pain

114.speaker: Abdirak
114.text: Your voice sounds so sweet, dear one. Keep going!

18.speaker: Abdirak
18.text: Tch. Beg sincerely or don't beg at all!

89.speaker: Shadowheart
89.text: Would you have joined up with them if you'd known they'd be indulging in this sort of thing, Astarion?
89.context: NodeContext: Wry. Observing the player engaging in a ritual involving them being whipped.

21.speaker: Astarion
21.text: I mean, I had my hopes.
21.context: NodeContext: response to 'would you have joined up with them if you knew they were into being whipped?'

68.speaker: Shadowheart
68.text: Don't wear them out entirely, priest. I might have use for them yet.
68.context: NodeContext: Tongue in cheek. Spoken to the pain priest administering the ritual

24.speaker: Astarion
24.context: CinematicNodeContext: ClappingNodeContext: Clapping, thrilled to see your companion take a lash from a whip

116.context: InternalNodeContext: No reaction, either because the reactions already played, or because Shadowheart and/or Astarion couldn't be included

69.speaker: Player
69.text: Come on. A child can hit harder than that.
69.context: InternalNodeContext: Succeeding this one is the "positive" outcome because it challenges the priest and boosts his enthousiasm

41.speaker: Abdirak
41.text: Hah! You want more? As you wish, dear one.

62.speaker: Abdirak
62.text: You claim to want more, but I feel you flinching, dear one.

51.speaker: Player
51.text: Slow your breathing to attain silence, inside and out.

77.speaker: Player
77.text: Make a show of screaming at the top of your lungs.

101.speaker: Player
101.context: InternalNodeContext: When the event flag CancelPenance is set, Osiris takes care of clearing more flags and resetting the penance

50.speaker: Abdirak
50.context: CinematicNodeContext: Excited, weapon in hand. Pause between strikes. NodeContext: Manic and joyous as he continues to strike the player.

74.speaker: Abdirak
74.text: Do not keep quiet, dear child. Embrace it!
74.context: CinematicNodeContext: Excited, weapon in hand. Pause between strikes. NodeContext: Second time striking the player. More manic and joyous as he gets into it.

12.speaker: Player
12.text: Take a deep breath and close your eyes.

108.speaker: Abdirak
108.text: Come now, child. Do not hold it in!

118.speaker: Abdirak
118.text: Is that a moan I hear? Delightful.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Writhe in exaggerated agony and cry out.
0.context: InternalNodeContext: Succeeding this one is the "positive" outcome because of the reaction to the pain

29.speaker: Abdirak
29.text: That's it, dear one! Let Loviatar hear you!

80.speaker: Astarion
80.text: My my. Who knew our friend had so much blood in them?
80.context: NodeContext: To Shadowheart. You're both standing there, casually watching your friend being whipped.

72.speaker: Shadowheart
72.text: Try not to lick your lips as you say that.

91.speaker: Shadowheart
91.text: Better not let too much be spilled. As much as I'm enjoying the show, we may still need them afterwards.

73.speaker: Shadowheart
73.text: Not the worst technique, priest. Good wrist movement, lots of enthusiasm...
73.context: NodeContext: Tongue in cheek. Complimenting the pain priest on how he's whipping the player.

11.speaker: Astarion
11.text: It was a fine strike. Excellent form!
11.context: NodeContext: Calling out - as if cheering on the priest.

107.speaker: Abdirak
107.text: Come now, child. You can do better than that.

88.speaker: Player
88.text: You look tired. Should I take over?
88.context: InternalNodeContext: Succeeding this one is the "positive" outcome because it challenges the priest and boosts his enthousiasm

54.speaker: Abdirak
54.text: Heh. You are shaking, dear one. And now is not the time for a brave face.

55.speaker: Abdirak
55.text: Hah! Wonderful. You want more? I'll give it to you.

117.speaker: Player
117.text: Slow your heart and sink deeper into the stillness.
117.context: InternalNodeContext: The tag is checked on the first option - if this show up, then the player is MONK

43.speaker: Player
43.text: Howl at the PAIN, the AGONY of it all.
43.context: InternalNodeContext: The tag is checked on the first option - if this show up, then the player is BARD

84.speaker: Abdirak
84.text: Pain is proof that we live! Revel in it.
84.context: CinematicNodeContext: Excited, weapon in hand. Pause between strikes. NodeContext: Player has called out for mercy. He has refused. Full preacher mode as he continues to strike the player. Awe and excitement in his voice.

90.speaker: Abdirak
90.text: Do not mock the gifts you receive!
90.context: InternalNodeContext: Previous answer was a wrong one
